title: Self-Directed Learning Design for Online Regression Prediction and Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts, Linear Regression Model Comprehension, and Programming Fundamentals
context.additional_context: An online regression prediction modeling course for students/job seekers, enabling self-directed learning in mobile environments. Practical training with real data streams to acquire fuzzy system design and rule-based prediction techniques.

learning_goals: Explain the design process of fuzzy rule-based regression models in data stream environments
Achieve prediction accuracy of over 85% by applying rule relevance-based parameter update methods in online learning environments
Implement rulebase expansion algorithms for hierarchical fuzzy systems to enable adaptive predictions for new data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
